entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: E 35 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
